name: Worlds Collide (Lara)
description:
WASD/Arrows to Move
R to Reload
Shift to Sprint
Left-Click and pull your mouse to swing a sword (Speed affects damage)
Left-Click anywhere to shoot with a gun
-------------------------------------------------------------------
3 Levels - 3 Enemies
Each round has a different combination of themes! (Mixed genres, almost!)

-------------------------------------------------------------------

It seems the WebGL version won't load, however now the 48 hours is up I'll have to wait until after voting to fix the error, for now the Exe download will have to do. Sorry! 

All music and art made by me in the previous 48 hours
This is my first published game and Game Jam, still have a lot to learn but it was a lot of fun to partake!
